articles.title: Barry Lane: Former Ryder Cup and European Tour golfer dies aged 62 - BBC
articles.description: Former Ryder Cup player Barry Lane dies at the age of 62 after a short illness.
articles.content:
Along with his European Tour success, Barry Lane was an eight-time Legends Tour winner

articles.title: World steps into 2023 after turbulent year - News24
articles.description: The world's eight billion people Saturday ushered in 2023, bidding farewell to a turbulent 12 months marked by war in Europe, stinging price rises, Lionel Messi's World Cup glory and the deaths of Queen Elizabeth, Pele and former pope Benedict.
articles.content:

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Croatia rings in New Year as fully integrated European Union member, adopting the euro and removing many border controls - ABC News
articles.description: Croatia joined the European Union in 2013, but had to fulfil strict economic conditions, including a stable exchange rate, controlled inflation and public spending, before becoming part of Europe's ID-check-free Schengen zone and switching to the euro.
articles.content:
At the stroke of midnight on Saturday, Croatia switched to the shared European currency, the euro, and removed dozens of border checkpoints to join the world's largest passport-free travel area.
